en.content: The hotel opened for the first time back in 1674. Since then almost everything has changed. When Baltasar Mayr first opened the Hotel it was called the Bauernbräu.

In 1827 Johann Holfeld the Hotel was renamed from Bauernbräu to Postbräu and in 1893 a new post office was created at the inner market. As a result of this the „Brauwirt“ became the „Neue Post“ and the „Postbräu“ was renamed to „Alte Post“. In 1982 the whole Hotel was renovated. Since 1997 Gabriele Falke and her Husband Udo have been taking care of the 43 rooms and the guests from all around the world. Like many other businesses, the hotel was and still is tremendously impacted by the corona pandemic.

de.content: 1674 wurde der Gasthof erstmals eröffnet. Seitdem hat sich sehr viel verändert. Um mehr über den Gasthof Alte Post zu erfahren hören Sie sich die Audiodatei an.
